titles.title: Helping Understand Narcotics Traces at the Executive Residence Act of 2023
Helping Understand Narcotics Traces at the Executive Residence Act of 2023
To require a report from the Director of the Secret Service on illicit use of controlled substances at the Executive Residence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Helping Understand Narcotics Traces at the Executive Residence Act of 2023 or the HUNTER Act of 2023
This bill requires the Secret Service to report on any illicit use of controlled substances at the White House.
